document.full_text: nevada's governor on wednesday named republican representative dean heller to replace senator john ensign, who announced he would resign next week after admitting to an extramarital affair with a campaign staffer.
document.title: nevada governor names heller to replace ensign in senate
lines_and_colors: nevada's governor on wednesday named republican representative dean heller to replace senator john ensign, who announced he would resign next week after admitting to an extramarital affair with a campaign staffer.
